```{r Z score with moving X,echo = F,comment = NA}
x = seq(60,140,0.1)
low_lim  = 60
upper_lim = 140
text_X_position = 70
sd = 15
mean = 100
saveGIF_simple(for (moving_x in seq(65,130,length.out = 80)) {
  y = dnorm(x,mean = mean,sd = sd)
  plot2_data_in_loop = as.data.frame(cbind(x, y))
  z_value = (moving_x - mean)/sd
  text = paste0('$\\Z =  \\frac{',round_simple(moving_x,2),' -', mean,'}{',sd,'}$ = ', round_simple(z_value,2))
  moving_text = paste('X = ', round_simple(moving_x,2))
  plot_ = plot2_data_in_loop %>% 
    ggplot(data =.,aes(x = x,y = y)) + 
    geom_line() + 
    geom_line(data = data.frame(x = c(moving_x,moving_x), y = c(0,0.03)),color = 'red') + 
    labs(title = 'Relationship between Z score & Normal Distribution',
         y = 'Frequency') + 
    theme_classic() + 
    annotate(geom = 'text',x = text_X_position, y = 0.04, label = latex2exp::TeX(text)) + 
    annotate(geom = 'text',x = moving_x, y = 0.032, label = moving_text) + 
    lims(y = c(0,0.04), 
         x = c(low_lim,upper_lim))
      
  print(plot(plot_))},
  movie_name = 'Plot3_moving_X_with_z_score.gif', 
  clone_repository_path = clone_repository_path,
  loop_speed = 0.01, loop_number = 1)
```


```{r Z score with changing sd,echo = F,comment = NA}
fix_X = 1.5
x = seq(0,10)
saveGIF_simple(loop_object = for (sd in seq(1,5,length.out = 80)) {
  x = seq(-7,7,0.1)
  y = dnorm(x,mean = 0,sd = sd)
  plot2_data_in_loop = as.data.frame(cbind(x, y))
  text = paste0('$\\Z =  \\frac{',fix_X,' -  0}{',sd,'}$ = ',round_simple(fix_X/sd,2))
  plot_ = plot2_data_in_loop %>% 
    ggplot(data =.,aes(x = x,y = y)) + 
    geom_line() + 
    geom_line(data = data.frame(x = c(fix_X,fix_X), y = c(0,0.4)),color = 'red') + 
    labs(title = 'Relationship between Z score & Normal Distribution',
         y = 'Frequency') + 
    theme_classic() + 
    annotate(geom = 'text',x = -4.5, y = 0.45, label = latex2exp::TeX(text)) + 
    lims(y = c(0,0.5))
      
  print(plot(plot_))},
  movie_name = 'Plot3_moving_sd_with_z_score.gif', 
  clone_repository_path = clone_repository_path,
  loop_speed = 0.01, loop_number = 1)
```
